short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Blocks passages on webpages that include a word the user has muted.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enter words in the popup, and it will be censored with asterisks. This extension will soon be able to be used for blocking triggers or avoiding spoilers.
